### `bf_red.increment` (bf_red::Increment)

_Increments the current cell by amount._


Syntax:

```
operation ::= `bf_red.increment` attr-dict
```


#### Attributes:

| Attribute | MLIR Type | Description |
| :-------: | :-------: | ----------- |
| `amount` | ::mlir::IntegerAttr | 8-bit signed integer attribute

### `bf_red.shift` (bf_red::Shift)

_Shift the pointer by value to the right if value > 0 and to the left else._


Syntax:

```
operation ::= `bf_red.shift` attr-dict
```


#### Attributes:

| Attribute | MLIR Type | Description |
| :-------: | :-------: | ----------- |
| `value` | ::mlir::IntegerAttr | 32-bit signed integer attribute
